reviews.review:
Portal's a little bit of an odd one for me. I love the story, the characters, setting, music, atmosphere, etc etc. But I find it difficult to replay, which is a real shame. It's really one of those types of games that's a "First Time Experience Only" type of game. Nonetheless I certainly recommend it to fans of puzzle games, and best part is: You don't technically need to play the first game in order to follow along with the second one. Obviously you'll miss some minor details, but nothing too big that ruins things for you.

Overall, definitely recommend it to fans of the first game, and fans of the Puzzle genre, but it does lack the amount of replay value these types of games kind of rely on given how quickly you can beat it.
El mejor videojuego solo/coperativo de poner portales a voluntad, los mejores puzzles de todos los juegos de colocar portales, felicidades ahora hay que jugar Half-Life 1 y 2 c:

This is a great Valve game. I have a short review.

It has lots to do in it. You have a whole story line, Community test chambers, and even the ability to create your own chambers. I recommend this game to fans of Valve. And if you have played the first Portal, then you'll probably like the second one.

Çok güzel bir oyun kaliteli final

This game was made in 2011 and the graphics still hold up today. The puzzles are amazing, the story is amazing, the soundtrack is amazing, this game still stands as one the of the best games to date. The humor hits and the environment is so pleasing to look at while you are solving puzzles. Everything has been considered and has been done perfectly. The music reacts to your progress in the puzzle, and perfectly fits into the environment. If this game was released today for the usual $60 price, it would probably win game of the year, and I would still buy it. At $10, even if you don't know how to use a computer you should still purchase this game. I am extremely nit-picky but I simply cannot find a SINGLE thing wrong with this game.

Świetna gra wymagająca logicznego myślenia. Z fabuły i zachowania występujących tam robotów możemy nauczyć się sporo, między innymi  w jaki sposób można zmienić się pod wpływem bycia czyimś władcą. Dodatkowo koniec gry jest bardzo urzekający.

Good fun! Especially once you start co-op with a friend! 
Collaborating and solving the puzzles give an immense sense of satisfaction!
Not that there isn't any sense of satisfaction while solving the single-player puzzles...
The story, lore and easter eggs(when and if you find them) also add to the experience. 
Would definitely recommend!

Nice story, good puzzle, and its cheap (on sale)

Amazing. It is absolutely worth it nearly a decade later. I loved playing it a ton. Portal 2 has quite complex puzzles which are very satisfying to solve. However what I did not expect is the game to have such an amazing storyline. It is full of great surprises. There are also tons of jokes and comical moments which fit the game very very well. It is great. The game characters have very strong personalities and it's a huge plus. After I completed the game, only then I realised what a masterpiece I was missing out on for the past 9 years. I will remember this game for years now. Now if you haven't played it yet, just do it. Highly recommended.

Also, before playing this, you should play the original Portal. There are lots of references to it in this game.
Portal 2. classic game with not so classic mechanics. very fun single player, very fun story and amazingly, a game on pc which still does split screen
